Portfolio.EditorNotFoundDescription: No editor ID provided. Please check the URL and try again.
Portfolio.EditorProfileNotFound: The editor profile for ID {{editorId}} could not be loaded. They may not exist or an error occurred.

Messages.SelectConversation: Select a conversation to start messaging.

CheckEmail.Title: Check your email
CheckEmail.Description:
We've sent a confirmation email to your inbox. Please click the verification link to activate your account.

Once your email is verified, you can log in and access your account.

Register.EditorDescription: For video editors who want to showcase their work and attract clients.
Register.ClientDescription: For users who want to find and hire video editors for their projects.

Login.AuthInfo: Authentication is now live with Supabase! You can create a real account or log in.

ForgotPassword.Title: Forgot Password
ForgotPassword.Description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a password reset link.
ForgotPassword.CheckEmailDescription: We've sent a password reset link to {{email}}
ForgotPassword.CheckEmailInfo: If you don't see the email in your inbox, please check your spam folder.
ForgotPassword.CheckEmailLinkInfo: The link in the email should redirect you to the reset password page. If clicking the link doesn't work, you can copy and paste the entire link into your browser's address bar.
ForgotPassword.PasswordResetSent: We've sent you a password reset link.

ResetPassword.Title: Reset Password
ResetPassword.PasswordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
ResetPassword.PasswordResetSuccess: Your password has been reset successfully.
ResetPassword.ResetWarningTitle: This page is for resetting your password after following a reset link from your email.

LimitReached.Title: Upload limit reached
LimitReached.Description: You have reached the limit of {{limit}} videos for your current plan "{{tierName}}". To upload more videos, please upgrade your plan.

VideosTab.NoVideosDescription: Upload your first video to start building your portfolio
